Package com.spec.web.expresso.message

Class HttpRequest

java.lang.Object
com.spec.web.expresso.message.HttpRequest
All Implemented Interfaces:
Request
public class HttpRequest extends Object implements Request
Wrapper class over HttpServletRequest. Helps in handling of Http request

    • json

      public <T> T json(Class<T> type) throws IllegalArgumentException, IOException
      Deserializes a JSON string to an instance of specified class pass the Class.class to the following function. Ex: json(Myclass.class) it will the object of Myclass
      Specified by:
      json in interface Request
      Type Parameters:
      T - The json response type
      Parameters:
      type - The class type to deserialize to
      Returns:
      The deserialized object
      Throws:
      IOException - May throw and IOException if it get issue reading/parsing the body of request.
      IllegalArgumentException - If payload is invalid
